Remark (Inhomogeneous systems of linear equations and afﬁne subspaces).
For A ∈ Rm×n and b ∈ Rm, the solution of the linear equation sys-
tem Ax = b is either the empty set or an afﬁne subspace of Rn of
dimension n−rk(A). In particular, the solution of the linear equation
λ1x1 + ... + λnxn = b, where (λ1,...,λ n) ̸= (0,..., 0), is a hyperplane
in Rn.
